channel.title: Tales of Industry
channel.description: Recent content on Tales of Industry

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? I’m Jan. In my past life as a Neuroscientist I studied how the brain learns. This peaked my interest into complex dynamical systems, what laws govern them, and how they can be improved. After transitioning into the Data Science and Machine Learning (ML) industry, I become fascinated by the complex dynamics that play out when data, software, and humans come together to build products. All machine learning challenges are technical challenges.

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: None of the content on this site represents the conditions, strategies, or opinions at previous or current employers. Descriptions of individuals, organizations, and events are fictional and often exaggerated to support arguments and contrasting views.

item.title: Data Science Anti-Patterns: Proliferating Data Artifacts
item.description: Use pipelines to fend off the curse of proliferating data artifacts.

item.title: Three Rules of Success for Data Science Projects
item.description: Data science projects are people projects.
